titles.title: A bill to approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.
A bill to approve the transfer of Yellow Creek Port properties in Iuka, Mississippi.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 112-243.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 558.

bill.summary: Approves the conveyance by the Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) to the state of Mississippi of the federally-owned Yellow Creek Port properties in the custody of the TVA at Iuka, Mississippi.
